description:
Korin wants Krillin, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu to report for special training! Meanwhile, Gohan’s grueling training causes him to undergo a shocking transformation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsuki no Kagayaku Yoru ni Daihenshin! Gohan Power no Himitsu
Uma transformação por causa da lua! O poder secreto de Gohan
การแปลงร่างในคืนเดือนเพ็ญ ความลับในพลังของโกฮัง
月の輝く夜に大変身! 悟飯パワーの秘密
